item.description:
Aspiring artists, create a winter scene with the help of Impressionist artist Connie Festo Lafond & a glass of wine!

We will have fun getting in touch with our creative side in this 2 hour class. You will leave with your own original matted masterpiece!


$39 for everything (wine included) or 2 for $70  ( a portion of the fee will go to the Red cross)

781-435-0587

www.skintosoul.com
item.how_to_find_us: take courtyard entrance in rear elevator to 3rd floor suite #380
item.name: Watercolor & Wine Playshop - Winter Birch Trees
